about.title: About GNB Transfer
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for VIP transfer services in Turkey
about.ourStoryText: GNB Transfer has been providing premium transfer services since 2010, ensuring safe and comfortable journeys for thousands of satisfied customers.
about.ourMissionText: To provide world-class transfer services with professional drivers, modern vehicles, and exceptional customer care.
about.safetyText: All our vehicles are regularly maintained and meet the highest safety standards.
about.reliabilityText: 24/7 customer support and on-time service guarantee.
about.comfortText: Luxury vehicles with spacious interiors and premium amenities.
about.teamDescription: Our professional team is dedicated to making your journey comfortable and memorable.
